name: Utsuho's Adventure
description:
Welcome to the first game I created back in 2016 for a class project.

It's a platformer with combat and boss.

 The level vary from linear to boss fight to go to X number of place. 

You can upgrade yourself with the money you earn by completing level, the better you do, the more you earn.

You can change the language to French and English.

I check to be sure everything is working fine but because this is an old game I made i can't guarantee is 100% fine and on top of that I'm reworking it.

Pretty much all the assets are from somewhere else, I put them in the credit,
